alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Lamar; Pickens; Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 1:53PM CDT until August 06 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Tuscaloosa County in west central Alabama... Northern Pickens County in west central Alabama... Fayette County in west central Alabama... Southern Lamar County in west central Alabama... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 153 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Vernon to near Millport to 6 miles northwest of Carrollton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fayette, Gordo, Reform, Millport, Carrollton, Berry, Kennedy, Belk, Ethelsville, Bankston, Bull City, Samantha, Lake Lurleen State Park, Ashcraft Corner, Boley Springs, Bankhead Lock And Dam, Binion Creek Landing, Cody, Stone Wall and Whitson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
